text: Inn kay aksay khufia mashwaron mein koi khair nahi haan! Bhalaee uss kay mashwaray mein hai jo kheyraat kay ya nek baat ka ya logon mein sulah keraney ka hukum keray aur jo shaks sirf Allah Taalaa ki raza mandi hasil kerney kay iraday say yeh kaam keray ussay hum yaqeenan boht bara sawab den gay
